mapper.insert: INSERT INTO communityReply (replyNum, communityNum, studentId, content, reg_date, parentNum, showReply, showCommunityReply) VALUES (communityReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{communityNum}, #{studentId}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{parentNum}, #{showReply}, #{showCommunityReply})
mapper.select: SELECT replyNum, communityNum, studentId, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, parentNum, showReply, showCommunityReply FROM communityReply WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum}
